Class BuildingPhaseData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.view.GamePhaseData
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.view.BuildingPhaseData
public class BuildingPhaseData extends GamePhaseData
Represents the client-side state during the Building Phase of the game.

In this phase, the player interacts with a central deck of ship cards to build their own ShipBoard, possibly reserving components, placing them on the grid, inspecting other playersâ€™ ships, or previewing upcoming adventure cards. This class also tracks timers and building state transitions.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(ShipBoard shipBoard, int freeShipCardsCount, FlightBoard.Type flightType, ArrayList<String> playersUsernames, Instant expireTimerInstant, int timersLeft)
      Initializes building data, including the ship, available players, timer, and ship cards.
      Parameters:
      shipBoard - the local player's ship board
      freeShipCardsCount - number of initial free ship cards
      flightType - the chosen flight board type
      playersUsernames - list of players in the game
      expireTimerInstant - instant when current timer will expire
      timersLeft - number of building retries left

    • notifyListener

      public void notifyListener()
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Notifies the listener that the internal state has changed.

      This method is abstract and must be implemented by each subclass to specify how updates should be propagated to the UI.

      Specified by:
      notifyListener in class GamePhaseData

    • handle

      public void handle(ServerAction action)
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Handles a ServerAction targeted at this phase's data.

      This method enables the application of the Visitor Pattern: the ServerAction knows how to manipulate this GamePhaseData through its loadData method.

      Specified by:
      handle in class GamePhaseData
      Parameters:
      action - the server-side action to process

    • isBuildingPhase

      public boolean isBuildingPhase()
      Description copied from class: GamePhaseData
      Indicates whether this is the building phase.
      Overrides:
      isBuildingPhase in class GamePhaseData
      Returns:
      false by default, overridden in specific phase subclasses
